segments.text: Looking at this scene, I can't help but feel a sense of calm from the garden outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The path and low bushes look so peaceful and well-maintained.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a stark contrast to the chaos happening inside the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the window panes divided into small squares, letting in plenty of light.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The curtains are tied back, making the room feel more open and airy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could step into that garden and take a walk down the path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks like such a lovely day outside, perfect for a stroll.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The fence in the background adds a sense of depth to the scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost feel the gentle breeze coming through the open window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a shame the people inside are too busy to notice the beauty outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think I'll just stand here and enjoy the view for a while.
segments.speaker: PAR
